content: Hey all. I have CallExpr syntax node. How do I resolve the the function semantically? For MethodCallExpr I did semantics.resolve_method_call like @Lauren»õiu Nicola suggested. And I followed similarly for other stuff. But I am stumped for this. For example, I have a call expr Subcommand::from("help"). How can I find if call_expr.expr is resolved to Subcommand::from?
I want to catch cases for (Subcommand::from)("help") and (|| Subcommand::from)()("help") etc..
Or I guess, I could alternatively try to find whether from in a path expr end resolves to Subcommand::from
you get the type of the callee and inspect it, e.g. using as_callable
